section.title: Screen Package Installed
section.para: The screen package provides a 'screen lock' capability to any tty device, analogous to a graphical screen lock. Please refer to the screen man page for more information on usage and configuration.

note.para: This module is a scan-only module, and will only check to see if the screen package is installed.

listitem.para: RHEL-06-000071 - The system must allow locking of the console screen in text mode.
